$.each(GetAddress.data,function(){
    
    let newRowUrl = this.url;
    let newRowId = this.id;
    
 function getJson (response) {
    
   return response.json();
  
 }

Promise.all([
  fetch('https://api.getAddress.io'+newRowUrl+'?api-key=i0lhe7bHKEm45UU62lM6BQ30143').then(getJson)
]).then(function (results) {
  var values = results[0];
  //alert('Done');
  var FullAddress = skuid.model.map().FullAddresses;
  if (values.length !== 0) {
    // Do stuff
   // alert(values.postcode);
    
  
     var row = FullAddress.createRow({doAppend:true,additionalConditions:[
           {field: 'id', value: newRowId},
           {field: 'Postcode', value: values.postcode},
           {field: 'Line 1', value: values.line_1},
           {field: 'Line 2', value: values.line_2},
           {field: 'County', value: values.county},
           {field: 'District', value: values.district},
           {field: 'Town/City', value: values.town_or_city},
           {field: 'Country', value: values.country}
           
        ]});
  setTimeout(function(){ FullAddress.save(); }, 3000);
  
 
    // alert('test');
    console.log('Done');
  }


 
}).catch(function () {
  console.log('Error');
});
});

</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="CreditDisplay" cachelocation="false">#credit-score-number-view {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: right;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 70px;
}

#credit-score-number-view .credit-score-bg {
    margin: 0 auto;
    font-size: 48px;
    color: white;
    background-color: #48CE94;
    padding-left: 12px;
    padding-right: 12px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 70px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

#credit-score-simple-view {
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 15px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-header,
#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-contents {
    margin: 0;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-item {
    white-space: nowrap;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row {
    height: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    line-height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-value {
    background-color: #7F7F7F;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-type {
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry {
    background-color: #1CBDD4;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 10px;
    padding: 5px 12px;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width: 80%;
    color: white;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field {
    width: 20%;
    text-align: right;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field .nx-fieldtext {
    background-color: white;
    color: #1CBDD4;
    width: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: 700;
}

#credit-score-figure {
    position: relative;
    height: 60px;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    left: 15px;
    bottom: 30px;
    right: 0;
    background-color: red;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar-tick {
    position: absolute;
    height: 25px;
    width: 4px;
    border: 1px solid #7F7F7F;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-number-sm {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #2D5074;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 3px 10px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-bar-wrapper {
    margin-left: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
